org.epics.ioc.support.pdrv
Class AbstractPortDriverInterruptLink

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.ioc.support.AbstractSupport
      org.epics.ioc.support.pdrv.AbstractPortDriverInterruptLink
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueueRequestCallback, PortDriverInterruptLink, RecordProcessRequester, Support, org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseFloat64ArrayInterrupt, BaseFloat64Average, BaseFloat64Interrupt, BaseInt32ArrayInterrupt, BaseInt32Average, BaseInt32Interrupt, BaseSerialInterrupt, BaseUInt32DigitalInterrupt
public abstract class AbstractPortDriverInterruptLink
extends AbstractSupport
implements RecordProcessRequester, QueueRequestCallback, PortDriverInterruptLink

Abstract base class for PortDriverInterruptLink. It creates a User, connects to a port and a device, and attempts to become the recordProcessor if process is true. Then derived class must handle the interrupt.

Author:
mrk

callback

public void callback(Status status,
                     User user)
Description copied from interface: QueueRequestCallback
The queueRequest has been dequeued.

Specified by:
callback in interface QueueRequestCallback
Parameters:
status - Status of the request. The request will fail if the port is not connected or if it is disabled. If the status is not Status.success than the user must NOT call and interfaces for the port and user.getMessage provides the reason.
user - The user.

recordProcessComplete

public void recordProcessComplete()
Description copied from interface: RecordProcessRequester
Called by record process to signify completion. This is called with the record unlocked.

Specified by:
recordProcessComplete in interface RecordProcessRequester

recordProcessResult

public void recordProcessResult(RequestResult requestResult)
Description copied from interface: RecordProcessRequester
The result of the process request. This is called with the record still active and locked. The requester can read data from the record.

Specified by:
recordProcessResult in interface RecordProcessRequester
Parameters:
requestResult - The result of the process request.
